recipe.title: Camembert Caraway Spread on Pumpernickel Toasts
ingredients: 1 (10-oz) ripe Camembert wheel with rind, quartered and at room temperature
3 oz cream cheese at room temperature (1/3 cup)
8 (1/3- to 1/2-inch-thick) slices pumpernickel bread, each cut into thirds
instructions: Purée Camembert, cream cheese, sour cream, shallot, and caraway seeds in a food processor. Stir in pepper and chives.

Make toasts: Preheat oven to 425°F. Brush 1 side of bread with butter and season with salt and pepper. Toast bread, buttered sides up, on a baking sheet in middle of oven until crisp, about 7 minutes. Transfer toasts to a rack to cool.
Brush 1 side of bread with butter and season with salt and pepper. Toast bread, buttered sides up, on a baking sheet in middle of oven until crisp, about 7 minutes. Transfer toasts to a rack to cool.
